<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aea-c95c-42f5-2e6c-e86044a00f0d#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Magyar Anjou-Legendárium.</string>
            <string language="en">Hungarian Anjou Legendry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ungarisches Anjou Legendry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Anjou Hongrois Legendry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Anjou Hungarian Legendry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Anjou Ungherese Legendry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουγγρικό Anjou Legendry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Anjou Húngara Legendry</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Szent László legenda négy jelenete, legyőzi a leányrabló kun vitézt.</string>
            <string language="en">Four scenes of the Saint Leslie legend, defeats the abductor Cumanian champion</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Magyar Anjou-Legendárium,  szentek élete,  magyar szentek,  Bologna,  Károly Róbert,  Szent László király,  Szűz Mária,  legendák,  </string>
            <string language="en">Hungarian Anjou Legendry, life of saints, Hungarian Saints, Bologna, Carl Roberto, King Saint Leslie, Madonna, legends</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vier Szenen der Heiliger Leslie Legende, 
Niederlagen der Entführungscumanian Meister</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quatre scènes de la légende de Saint Leslie, 
défaites le champion abducteur de Cumanian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quatro cenas da legenda de Saint Leslie, derrotas
o campeão abductor de Cumanian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quattro scene della leggenda del San Leslie, 
sconfitte il campione abduttore di Cumanian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέσσερις σκηνές του μύθου Αγίου Leslie, νικούν τον
απαγωγό πρωτοπόρο Cumanian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuatro escenas de la leyenda de Santo Leslie, 
derrotas el campeón abductor de Cumanian</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ungarisches Anjou Legendry, Leben der Heiliger, 
ungarische Heilige, Bologna, Karl Roberto, König Heiliges Leslie, 
Madonna, Legenden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Anjou hongrois Legendry, la vie des saints, saints 
hongrois, Bologna, Karl Roberto, le Roi Saint Leslie, Madonna, 
légendes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Anjou hungarian Legendry, vida dos saints, saints 
hungarian, Bolonha, Carl Roberto, rei Saint Leslie, Madonna, legendas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Anjou ungherese Legendry, vita dei san, san ungheresi,
Bologna, Carl Roberto, re San Leslie, Madonna, leggende</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουγγρικό Anjou Legendry, ζωή των Αγίων, ουγγρικοί 
Αγιοι, Μπολόνια, Carl Roberto, βασιλιάς Αγιος Leslie, 
Madonna, μύθοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Anjou húngara Legendry, vida de los santos, santos 
húngaros, Bolonia, Carl Roberto, rey Santo Leslie, Madonna, leyendas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74517</entry>

    <name>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
